methodology.description: Deep geopolitical analysis focusing on incentives, power dynamics, and hidden narratives
themes: Trade & Sovereignty - Who surrenders what, who profits
Capital Flows - Investment strings, debt traps, leverage
Military & Security - Wars, conflicts, resource competition
Resources & Extraction - Who controls what, at what cost
Elite Accountability - Corruption, conflicts of interest, whose interests are really served
Propaganda & Narratives - What story is being told vs. reality
Sovereignty Loss - Permanent concessions, constraints, obligations
